assignments.name: Assign_Return_Items_Input_Representation_Data
assignments.label: Assign Return Items Input Representation Data

formulas.name: FX_Generate_Refunded_Items
formulas.expression: if(ISBLANK({!V_Refunded_Items}) , "" , BR() ) + "- SKU: " + {!L10_Loop_Over_ROLIs.Product2.StockKeepingUnit} + "; Quantity: " + TEXT({!L10_Loop_Over_ROLIs.QuantityReceived}) + "; UnitPrice: " + TEXT({!L10_Loop_Over_ROLIs.OrderItemSummary.GrossUnitPrice}) + "; TotalAmount: " +TEXT({!L10_Loop_Over_ROLIs.OrderItemSummary.TotalAmtWithTax})

loops.name: L30_Loop_Over_ROLIs_To_map_CML
loops.label: L30 Loop Over ROLIs To map CML

fields.name: Display_Zone7
fields.fieldText: Sorry, Something is missing - please check the quantity received and the amount in return order line items!

fields.name: Display_Zone5
fields.fieldText: Error while creating refund

fields.name: Display_Zone5_0
fields.fieldText: Error while creating CreditMemo/Ensure Refund

fields.name: Success_Message
fields.fieldText: The Refund with number {!Get_Created_Refund_Number.RefundNumber} and the Credit Memo with number {!Get_CreditMemo_Reocord.DocumentNumber} are successfully created.

fields.name: TotalAmount
fields.fieldText: Total Amount : {!FX_RefundAmountToDisplayWithIsoCode}

fields.name: Error_Payment_not_Captured
fields.fieldText: Cannot generate Refund. No initial funds were captured.

fields.name: Display_Zone1
fields.fieldText: Sorry, Something was wrong - Check you Data and try again later !

fields.name: Refund_greater_than_Available_Refund
fields.fieldText: Cannot generate Refund. Refund exceeds the available refund.

fields.name: Display_Zone2
fields.fieldText: Sorry, The Return Order should be in Received Status to Ensure Refund

fields.name: Display_Zone3
fields.fieldText: Sorry, There is no ReturnOrderLineItem to refund - please check your data and try later!

fields.name: Display_Zone2_0
fields.fieldText: Sorry, The Return Order is already refunded
